mapper.select: select t1.* from (SELECT t1.`BM`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`GZJX`, t1.`GZNLJTD`, t1.`GZNLJTD_XBN`, t1.`JSWMJC`, t1.`KHLX`, t1.`PARJXKHXHZID`, t1.`PARJXKHXHZNAME`, t1.`SZMZPY`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XH`, t1.`YG`, t1.`YGID`, t1.`YWNLKS`, t1.`ZZ` FROM `T_PARJXKHXHZ` t1 ) t1 where parjxkhxhzid=#{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`BM`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`GZJX`, t1.`GZNLJTD`, t1.`GZNLJTD_XBN`, t1.`JSWMJC`, t1.`KHLX`, t1.`PARJXKHXHZID`, t1.`PARJXKHXHZNAME`, t1.`SZMZPY`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XH`, t1.`YG`, t1.`YGID`, t1.`YWNLKS`, t1.`ZZ` FROM `T_PARJXKHXHZ` t1

SELECT t1.`BM`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`GZJX`, t1.`GZNLJTD`, t1.`GZNLJTD_XBN`, t1.`JSWMJC`, t1.`KHLX`, t1.`PARJXKHXHZID`, t1.`PARJXKHXHZNAME`, t1.`SZMZPY`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XH`, t1.`YG`, t1.`YGID`, t1.`YWNLKS`, t1.`ZZ` FROM `T_PARJXKHXHZ` t1
